casebody.data:
Noemi ESCOBAR, Individually and as Guardian for J.V., an infant, Plaintiff-Movant,
v.
David A. MAZIE and Mazie, Slater, Katz & Freeman, LLC, Defendants-Respondents. M-1094 September Term 2018
082765 Supreme Court of New Jersey. June 13, 2019

ORDER

It is ORDERED that the motion for leave to appeal is denied.
